questions.sentence:
Form a C program to check the nearest Satellite Cassini. If Cassini is Active, connect for communication.Else Surveyor needs to get closer. 

		  char satelliteStatus
		  int active 
		
		  PRINT(Enter the satellite's status (A for Active, I for Inactive)
		  GET([       ], &satelliteStatus)
		  
		SWITCH [      ]
				CASE 'A':
					PRINT(Satellite is active and operational)
					SET active = 1
					BREAK
				CASE 'I':
					PRINT(Satellite is inactive. Rebooting...)
					SET active = 0
					BREAK
				DEFAULT:
					[     ](Satellite not in range. Please get closer!)
					SET active = 0
					BREAK
